text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Fmm fmm fmmph, we pulled 
another awesome prank today!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Listen to this! We painted a snake
pattern on the hose Air Groove uses to
water her plants...!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
And what a splendid result we saw! 
She flung the hose screaming, flooding 
everything!! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha―!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
… And right now, we're in the middle of
running from a furious Air Groove. H-
Hurry up and hide us in the trainer's
office.
